key_issues.description: CHEGA emphasizes strengthening family as a core institution and proposes creating a Ministry of Family to reinforce moral, civic, and economic aspects of family life.

proposals.title: Creation of the Ministry of Family
proposals.details: Establish a dedicated ministry to oversee the reconstruction of family values across various areas of governance.

key_issues.description: CHEGA advocates for moral and social renewal, focusing on individual responsibility and social solidarity to combat social ills.

proposals.title: Promotion of Individual Responsibility
proposals.details: Encourage personal accountability before solidarity, aimed at reducing social parasitism and promoting dignified work.

key_issues.description: CHEGA opposes policies that they believe undermine national identity and supports regulated immigration based on qualifications and labor market needs.

proposals.title: Regulated Immigration Policy
proposals.details: Implement a controlled immigration system prioritizing qualifications and labor market needs, and oppose demographic replacement.

key_issues.description: CHEGA proposes economic policies that reduce state intervention, lower taxes, and prioritize budget balance.

proposals.title: Reduction of State Intervention
proposals.details: Decrease the state's role in the economy, reduce taxes, and ensure budget balance except in exceptional circumstances.

key_issues.description: CHEGA aims to reform the justice system by increasing penalties for serious crimes and streamlining legal processes.

proposals.title: Harsher Penalties for Serious Crimes
proposals.details: Increase the maximum penalty for violent crimes, terrorism, corruption, and sexual offenses against minors.

key_issues.description: CHEGA plans to reform the healthcare system to improve efficiency and quality, balancing public, private, and social sectors.

proposals.title: Healthcare System Reform
proposals.details: Reform the national healthcare system focusing on efficiency, quality, and balanced involvement of public, private, and social sectors.

key_issues.description: CHEGA advocates for educational reform based on six fundamental principles to combat indiscipline, bureaucracy, and ideological indoctrination.

proposals.title: Reform of Basic and Secondary Education
proposals.details: Implement six fundamental principles in education reform, focusing on discipline, reducing bureaucracy, and defending national exams.

key_issues.description: CHEGA focuses on supporting rural development and agriculture, including promoting local products and supporting family agriculture.

proposals.title: Support for Rural Development
proposals.details: Incentivize the purchase of local products, support family agriculture, and improve rural infrastructure like broadband internet.

key_issues.description: CHEGA aims to reform the social security system, promoting private initiative and ensuring no cuts to state-assured pensions.

proposals.title: Social Security System Reform
proposals.details: Transition to a contributory system based on capitalization and individual savings, while opposing cuts to current pensions.

key_issues.description: CHEGA emphasizes the importance of investing in the military and honoring veterans, ensuring national sovereignty and security.

proposals.title: Investment in National Defense
proposals.details: Commit to investing 2% of GDP in defense by 2024 and honor commitments to veterans and their families.

key_issues.description: CHEGA focuses on empowering the youth through educational reform, job market integration, and housing support.

proposals.title: Empowerment of Youth
proposals.details: Promote educational reform, provide fiscal benefits for young workers, and improve housing credit access for the youth.

key_issues.description: CHEGA advocates for strengthening public order and security, respecting police authority, and improving their working conditions.

proposals.title: Strengthening Public Order and Security
proposals.details: Enhance respect for police authority, improve their working conditions, and ensure public safety and tranquility.
